sen.j: 19歳で諸国へ旅に出て宇都宮市興禅寺 (宇都宮市)の物外や播磨国赤穂市三友寺の南是の元などを訪れた後、妙心寺聖沢院の庸山景庸に師事し、愚堂の号を与えられて印可を受けた（後に妙心寺住持を三度勤めた）。
sen.e: He went on a pilgrimage to various provinces, visited Motsugai of Kozen-ji Temple in Utsunomiya City and Nanze of Sanyu-ji Temple in Ako City, Suma Province, and studied under Keiyo YOZAN of Shotaku-in Temple, Myoshin-ji Temple before given the go (Buddhist title) of Gudo and Inka (Certification of spiritual achievement) (he later served Myoshin-ji Temple as Jujifor three times).
